title: The seuen sorowes that women haue when theyr husbandes be deade. Compyled by Robert Copland
author: Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547.
publisher: In Lothburi ouer agaynste Sainct Margarytes church by me Wyllyam Copland],
notes: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
